Great food - cocktail salad was wonderful.  Mini vegan burgers were great, the beetroot was the best.  My wife had the vegan ceviche.  Very intense seaweed so if you're shy of it at all, you may want to steer clear.  However, she loved it.  Ordered green medicine juice (superb), ordered the juice "salad on the go" but they informed us that they were out of the ingredients to make.  We also ordered the kale salad but we were told neither store had any kale.  After buying juices at the other shop we saw a large amount of kale...kinda weird?  Service was very subpar but food is too good not to go back. Multiple waiters but seemed very uninterested in helping.
